--create topic testtopic;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    col6 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3,
        v4,
        v5,
        v6
    )
);
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_1 as select * from test_source_1;
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;

--test with source;

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1 | col2        | col3         | col4         | col5         | col6                       |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | 10   | 1000        | 1234.4321    | 12345678.99  | str1         | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |
| 2                    | 20   | 2000        | 2234.4321    | 22345678.99  | str2         | 2020-01-02 01:00:00.123456 |
| 3                    | 30   | 3000        | 3234.4321    | 32345678.99  | str3         | 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 |
| 4                    | 40   | 4000        | 4234.4321    | 42345678.99  | str4         | 2020-01-04 01:00:00.123456 |
| 5                    | 50   | 5000        | 5234.4321    | 52345678.99  | str5         | 2020-01-05 01:00:00.123456 |
| 6                    | 60   | 6000        | 6234.4321    | 62345678.99  | str6         | 2020-01-06 01:00:00.123456 |
| 7                    | 70   | 7000        | 7234.4321    | 72345678.99  | str7         | 2020-01-07 01:00:00.123456 |
| 8                    | 80   | 8000        | 8234.4321    | 82345678.99  | str8         | 2020-01-08 01:00:00.123456 |
| 9                    | 90   | 9000        | 9234.4321    | 92345678.99  | str9         | 2020-01-09 01:00:00.123456 |
| 10                   | 100  | 10000       | 10234.4321   | 93345678.99  | str10        | 2020-01-10 01:00:00.123456 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
10 rows returned

select col0, col1, col2, col3, col4, col5, col6 from test_source_1 order by col0;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1 | col2        | col3         | col4         | col5         | col6                       |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | 10   | 1000        | 1234.4321    | 12345678.99  | str1         | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |
| 2                    | 20   | 2000        | 2234.4321    | 22345678.99  | str2         | 2020-01-02 01:00:00.123456 |
| 3                    | 30   | 3000        | 3234.4321    | 32345678.99  | str3         | 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 |
| 4                    | 40   | 4000        | 4234.4321    | 42345678.99  | str4         | 2020-01-04 01:00:00.123456 |
| 5                    | 50   | 5000        | 5234.4321    | 52345678.99  | str5         | 2020-01-05 01:00:00.123456 |
| 6                    | 60   | 6000        | 6234.4321    | 62345678.99  | str6         | 2020-01-06 01:00:00.123456 |
| 7                    | 70   | 7000        | 7234.4321    | 72345678.99  | str7         | 2020-01-07 01:00:00.123456 |
| 8                    | 80   | 8000        | 8234.4321    | 82345678.99  | str8         | 2020-01-08 01:00:00.123456 |
| 9                    | 90   | 9000        | 9234.4321    | 92345678.99  | str9         | 2020-01-09 01:00:00.123456 |
| 10                   | 100  | 10000       | 10234.4321   | 93345678.99  | str10        | 2020-01-10 01:00:00.123456 |

| col1 | col2        | col3                 | col4                 | col5                 | col6                       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 10   | 1000        | 1234.4321            | 12345678.99          | str1                 | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |

select col6, col5, col4, col3, col2, col1, col0 from test_source_1 order by col6;

| col6                       | col5         | col4         | col3         | col2        | col1 | col0                 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 | str1         | 12345678.99  | 1234.4321    | 1000        | 10   | 1                    |
| 2020-01-02 01:00:00.123456 | str2         | 22345678.99  | 2234.4321    | 2000        | 20   | 2                    |
| 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 | str3         | 32345678.99  | 3234.4321    | 3000        | 30   | 3                    |
| 2020-01-04 01:00:00.123456 | str4         | 42345678.99  | 4234.4321    | 4000        | 40   | 4                    |
| 2020-01-05 01:00:00.123456 | str5         | 52345678.99  | 5234.4321    | 5000        | 50   | 5                    |
| 2020-01-06 01:00:00.123456 | str6         | 62345678.99  | 6234.4321    | 6000        | 60   | 6                    |
| 2020-01-07 01:00:00.123456 | str7         | 72345678.99  | 7234.4321    | 7000        | 70   | 7                    |
| 2020-01-08 01:00:00.123456 | str8         | 82345678.99  | 8234.4321    | 8000        | 80   | 8                    |
| 2020-01-09 01:00:00.123456 | str9         | 92345678.99  | 9234.4321    | 9000        | 90   | 9                    |
| 2020-01-10 01:00:00.123456 | str10        | 93345678.99  | 10234.4321   | 10000       | 100  | 10                   |

select col3, col4, col1, col5, col0, col5, col6 from test_source_1 order by col3;

| col3         | col4         | col1 | col5         | col0                 | col5         | col6                       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1234.4321    | 12345678.99  | 10   | str1         | 1                    | str1         | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |
| 2234.4321    | 22345678.99  | 20   | str2         | 2                    | str2         | 2020-01-02 01:00:00.123456 |
| 3234.4321    | 32345678.99  | 30   | str3         | 3                    | str3         | 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 |
| 4234.4321    | 42345678.99  | 40   | str4         | 4                    | str4         | 2020-01-04 01:00:00.123456 |
| 5234.4321    | 52345678.99  | 50   | str5         | 5                    | str5         | 2020-01-05 01:00:00.123456 |

| 10234.4321   | 93345678.99  | 100  | str10        | 10                   | str10        | 2020-01-10 01:00:00.123456 |

| col1 | col1 | col1 |
+--------------------+
| 10   | 10   | 10   |
| 20   | 20   | 20   |
| 30   | 30   | 30   |

| 90   | 90   | 90   |
| 100  | 100  | 100  |

| col6                       | col6                       | col6                       |

| 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |

10 rows returned

-- now test with MV;

select * from test_mv_1 order by col0;
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0                 | col1 | col2        | col3         | col4         | col5         | col6                       |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | 10   | 1000        | 1234.4321    | 12345678.99  | str1         | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |
| 2                    | 20   | 2000        | 2234.4321    | 22345678.99  | str2         | 2020-01-02 01:00:00.123456 |
| 3                    | 30   | 3000        | 3234.4321    | 32345678.99  | str3         | 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 |
| 4                    | 40   | 4000        | 4234.4321    | 42345678.99  | str4         | 2020-01-04 01:00:00.123456 |
| 5                    | 50   | 5000        | 5234.4321    | 52345678.99  | str5         | 2020-01-05 01:00:00.123456 |
| 6                    | 60   | 6000        | 6234.4321    | 62345678.99  | str6         | 2020-01-06 01:00:00.123456 |
| 7                    | 70   | 7000        | 7234.4321    | 72345678.99  | str7         | 2020-01-07 01:00:00.123456 |
| 8                    | 80   | 8000        | 8234.4321    | 82345678.99  | str8         | 2020-01-08 01:00:00.123456 |
| 9                    | 90   | 9000        | 9234.4321    | 92345678.99  | str9         | 2020-01-09 01:00:00.123456 |
| 10                   | 100  | 10000       | 10234.4321   | 93345678.99  | str10        | 2020-01-10 01:00:00.123456 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
10 rows returned

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | 10   | 1000        | 1234.4321    | 12345678.99  | str1         | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |
